However, this equation doesn't give me 50. It seems I made a mistake in my approach. Let me try another method.

<answer>((74 + (9 / (15/74))) - 15 = (74 + (9 / 0.20283)) - 15 = (74 + 44.33) - 15 = 118.33 - 15 = 103.33</answer>

<answer>((74 + (9 / 15)) / 1.5 = (74 + 0.6) / 1.5 = 74.6 / 1.5 = 49.7333333333333</answer>

<answer>(74 + (9 / 15))
